H0.text: What type of animal is the star of the 2005 film Racing Stripes. Horse

H1.text: What type of animal is the star of the 2005 film Racing Stripes. Donkey

H2.text: What type of animal is the star of the 2005 film Racing Stripes. Mule

H3.text: What type of animal is the star of the 2005 film Racing Stripes. Zevra

A4.text: The film Racing Stripes features a captive zebra ostracised from the horses and ends up being ridden by a rebellious girl.

A5.text: The most common hybrid is the mule, a cross between a 'jack' (male donkey) and a mare.
